name: The Polygon
description:
In development.
I will certainly update and upgrade the game. It is only just a concept version with almost no content. It was made for Devtober 2020. Wait for updates soon. Thank you and enjoy. Shoot, move, kill, die... You know the drill. Fly around the small map, survive all the waves, defend yourself between the 2 portals, what constantly spawn 3 types of enemies:
  • Interceptor – tries to get close.
  • Inhibitor – decides where to spawn his minions.
  • Sharpshooter – shoots from the distance.
Controls: [WASD] - Move [Mouse / Arrows] - Shoot [Space] - Switch Weapon
